titleStmt.title: Mans wrath and Gods praise. Or, A thanks-giving sermon, preached at Taunton, in the county of Somerset, the 11th. of May, (a day to be had in everlasting remembrance) for the gratious deliverance of that poore towne from the strait siege. / By George Newton, Mr. of Arts, and minister of the Gospell in that place.
titleStmt.author: Newton, George, 1602-1681.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by W. Wilson, for Francis Eglesfield at the Marigold in Pauls Church-yard, and are to be sold by George Treagle in Taunton,

notesStmt.note: An variant of the edition lacking George Treagle's name in the imprint.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
